def_cn: (正式或明确的口头或书面)陈述，声明
def_en: A statement is something that you say or write which gives information in a formal or definite way.

def_cn: (为某一场合特别发表的)官方声明，正式声明
def_en: A statement is an official or formal announcement that is issued on a particular occasion.

def_cn: (嫌疑人或证人向警方提供的)陈述，证词
def_en: You can refer to the official account of events which a suspect or a witness gives to the police as a statement .

def_cn: (意见或观点的)表现，表达
def_en: If you describe an action or thing as a statement, you mean that it clearly expresses a particular opinion or idea that you have.
A printed document showing how much money has been paid into and taken out of a bank or building society account is called a statement .

def_cn: 证明(儿童)有特殊教育需求
def_en: If a child is statemented, social services staff write a document stating that the child has special educational needs, and the local education authority has to make sure that everything that is necessary is provided for that child.
